trans-unit.source: Shaders written in GLSL allow for complex transformations and visual effects to be written, however they should be used with care. Using a ShaderEffectSource causes a scene to be prerendered into an FBO before it can be drawn. This extra overhead can be quite expensive.
trans-unit.target: 用GLSL编写的着色器允许编写复杂的转换和视觉效果，但是应谨慎使用。使用ShaderEffectSource会使场景在绘制之前先渲染到FBO中。这种额外的开销可能会非常昂贵。

trans-unit.source: Short options are single letters. The option v would be specified by passing -v on the command line. In the default parsing mode, short options can be written in a compact form, for instance -abc is equivalent to -a -b -c. The parsing mode for can be set to ParseAsLongOptions, in which case -abc will be parsed as the long option abc.
trans-unit.target: 短选项是单个字母。选项 v 将通过在命令行上传递 -v 来指定。在默认的解析模式下，简短选项可以紧凑的形式编写，例如 -abc 等效于 -a -b -c 。可以将的解析模式设置为ParseAsLongOptions，在这种情况下， -abc 将被解析为长选项 abc 。

trans-unit.source: Signal handlers are a special sort of method attribute, where the method implementation is invoked by the QML engine whenever the associated signal is emitted. Adding a signal to an object definition in QML will automatically add an associated signal handler to the object definition, which has, by default, an empty implementation. Clients can provide an implementation, to implement program logic.
trans-unit.target: 信号处理程序是一种特殊的方法属性，只要发出关联的信号，QML引擎就会调用该方法的实现。在QML中向对象定义添加信号会自动向该对象定义添加关联的信号处理程序，该信号处理程序默认情况下为空实现。客户可以提供一种实现，以实现程序逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Signal handlers are a special sort of method attribute, where the method implementation is invoked by the QML engine whenever the associated signal is emitted. Adding a signal to an object definition in QML will automatically add an associated signal handler to the object definition, which has, by default, an empty implementation. Clients can provide an implementation, to implement program logic.

trans-unit.source: Signal objects have a connect() method to a connect a signal either to a method or another signal. When a signal is connected to a method, the method is automatically invoked whenever the signal is emitted. This mechanism enables a signal to be received by a method instead of a signal handler.
trans-unit.target: 信号对象具有 connect() 方法，用于将信号连接到方法或另一个信号。将信号连接到方法时，只要发出信号，该方法就会自动调用。这种机制使信号可以通过方法而不是信号处理程序来接收。

trans-unit.source: Signals and slots are used for communication between objects. The signals and slots mechanism is a central feature of Qt and probably the part that differs most from the features provided by other frameworks.
trans-unit.target: 信号和插槽用于对象之间的通信。信号和插槽机制是Qt的核心功能,也可能是与其他框架提供的功能差异最大的部分。

trans-unit.source: Signals and slots are used for communication between objects. The signals and slots mechanism is a central feature of Qt and probably the part that differs most from the features provided by other frameworks. ...
trans-unit.target: 信号和插槽用于对象之间的通信。信号和插槽机制是Qt的核心功能,也可能是与其他框架提供的功能差异最大的部分。...

trans-unit.source: Signals and slots are used for communication between objects. The signals and slots mechanism is a central feature of Qt and probably the part that differs most from the features provided by other frameworks. Signals and slots are made possible by Qt's meta-object system.

Signals and slots are used for communication between objects. The signals and slots mechanism is a central feature of Qt and probably the part that differs most from the features provided by other frameworks. Signals and slots are made possible by Qt's meta-object system.
trans-unit.target: 信号和插槽用于对象之间的通信。信号和时隙机制是Qt的主要功能，可能是与其他框架提供的功能最大不同的部分。Qt的元对象系统使信号和时隙成为可能。

trans-unit.source: Signals and slots can have return types, but signals or slots returning references will be treated as returning void.
trans-unit.target: 信号和槽可以有返回类型,但返回引用的信号或槽将被视为返回void。

trans-unit.source: Signals and slots, properties and children of
trans-unit.target: 信号和槽,属性和子代。

trans-unit.source: Signals are automatically generated by the moc and must not be implemented in the .cpp file. They can never have return types (i.e. use void).
trans-unit.target: 信号是由Moc自动生成的，不得在 .cpp 文件中实现。他们永远不能有返回类型（即使用 void ）。

trans-unit.source: Signals are emitted by an object when its internal state has changed in some way that might be interesting to the object's client or owner. Signals are public access functions and can be emitted from anywhere, but we recommend to only emit them from the class that defines the signal and its subclasses.
trans-unit.target: 当一个对象的内部状态以某种方式发生变化时,信号就会被对象的客户端或所有者发出。信号是公共访问函数,可以从任何地方发出,但我们建议只从定义信号的类及其子类中发出。

trans-unit.source: Signals are not blocked by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,信号不被屏蔽。

trans-unit.source: Signals can be added to custom QML types through the signal keyword.

trans-unit.source: Similar semantics for the <Qualifier> apply to directory imports as for module imports; for more information on the topic, please see the previous section about Importing into a Qualified Local Namespace.

Similar to \code, \badcode and \endcode commands enclose content that is rendered verbatim in a separate paragraph, but no parsing or automatic link creation is performed. Instead, the content is treated as plain text.
trans-unit.target: 与\ code相似，\ badcode和\ endcode命令将逐字呈现的内容包含在单独的段落中，但是不执行任何解析或自动链接创建。而是将内容视为纯文本。

trans-unit.source: Similar to functions, the default type may be linked or marked with the \c command.
trans-unit.target: 与函数类似，默认类型可以用 \c 命令链接或标记。

trans-unit.source: Similar to \code, \badcode and \endcode commands enclose content that is rendered verbatim in a separate paragraph, but no parsing or automatic link creation is performed. Instead, the content is treated as plain text.
Similar to QObject::setObjectName() (which this method calls), but this version also applies the
trans-unit.target: 类似于QObject :: setObjectName（）（此方法调用），但此版本也适用

trans-unit.source: Similar to functions, the default type may be linked or marked with the \c command.
Similar to Indexed, pixel values represent a vector of available gray tones. QColormap uses the index of the gray tone that most closely matches the computed gray tone of an RGB value.
trans-unit.target: 与 Indexed 相似，像素值表示可用灰色调的向量。QColormap使用最接近匹配所计算的RGB值的灰度的灰度索引。

trans-unit.source: Similar to RenderDirectToBackground mode, except that the graph will not clear the whole window before rendering the graph. This mode is better for windows where you have other custom items besides the graphs that also draw on the window background. In that case you need to either take care of the window clearing yourself or ensure that all areas of the window are fully covered with opaque items. If one graph in the window uses either of the direct rendering modes, then all other graphs in the same window also drawn in direct modes should use the exact same direct rendering mode. Otherwise some graphs may not show up, depending on the drawing order of the graphs.
trans-unit.target: 与 RenderDirectToBackground 模式类似，不同之处在于在渲染图形之前图形不会清除整个窗口。对于在窗口上还绘制其他图形的窗口中，您还有其他自定义项目的窗口，此模式更好。在这种情况下，您需要清理自己的窗户或确保窗户的所有区域都被不透明的物品完全覆盖。如果窗口中的一个图形使用任何一种直接渲染模式，则同一窗口中也以直接模式绘制的所有其他图形应使用完全相同的直接渲染模式。否则，某些图形可能不会显示，具体取决于图形的绘制顺序。

trans-unit.source: Similar to classesbymodule argument, but used for listing the JavaScript types from the module specified with the second argument.
trans-unit.target: 类似于 classesbymodule 参数，但用于列出使用第二个参数指定的模块中的JavaScript类型。

trans-unit.source: Similar to classesbymodule argument, but used for listing the QML types from the QML module specified with the second argument.
trans-unit.target: 类似于 classesbymodule 参数，但用于列出使用第二个参数指定的QML模块中的QML类型。

trans-unit.source: Similar to CompositionMode_Difference, but with a lower contrast. Painting with white inverts the destination color, whereas painting with black leaves the destination color unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 类似于CompositionMode_Difference,但对比度较低。用白色涂抹会反转目标色,而用黑色涂抹则不会改变目标色。

trans-unit.source: Similar to Decimal, but the exponent is a power of 2 instead.
trans-unit.target: 类似于十进制,但指数是2的幂。

trans-unit.source: Similar to PartialUpdateBlit, but instead of using framebuffer blits, the contents of the extra framebuffer is rendered by drawing a textured quad with blending enabled. This, unlike PartialUpdateBlit, allows alpha blended content and works even when the glBlitFramebuffer is not available. Performance-wise this setting is likely to be somewhat slower than PartialUpdateBlit.
trans-unit.target: 类似于PartialUpdateBlit,但不是使用帧缓冲区blits,而是通过绘制一个启用了混合的纹理四边形来渲染额外帧缓冲区的内容。与PartialUpdateBlit不同的是,这允许alpha混合内容,并且即使在glBlitFramebuffer不可用时也能工作。从性能上来说,这个设置可能会比PartialUpdateBlit慢一些。

trans-unit.source: Similar to Repeat, but scales the image down to ensure that the last tile is not cropped.
trans-unit.target: 类似于 "重复",但缩小图像的比例,以确保最后一块瓷砖不被裁剪。

trans-unit.source: Similar to items in Qt Quick, Popup's x and y coordinates are relative to its parent. This means that opening a popup that is a child of a Button, for example, will cause the popup to be positioned relative to the button.
trans-unit.target: 与Qt Quick中的项目类似，Popup的x和y坐标是相对于其父级的。这意味着，例如，打开作为Button子级的弹出窗口，将导致该弹出窗口相对于Button定位。

trans-unit.source: Similar to l{Texture Aliasing}, a material reflecting the environment will sub-sample the image. In some cases, as seen on the left in the image below, becomes obvious when fine details are being skipped.
Similar to the qwindows plugin, but replaces the raster paint engine with a Direct2D-based paint engine for QPixmap and QBackingStore.
trans-unit.target: 与 qwindows 插件类似，但是将QPixmap和QBackingStore的光栅绘制引擎替换为基于Direct2D的绘制引擎。

trans-unit.source: Similarly to QModelIndexList, QItemSelection is exposed in QML as a JavaScript array of QItemSelectionRange objects. Conversions are automatically made from and to C++. In fact, any JavaScript array can be converted back to QItemSelection, with non-QItemSelectionRange objects replaced by empty QItemSelectionRanges.

Similarly to QMouseEvent, Qt automatically grabs each touch point on the first press inside a widget, and the widget will receive all updates for the touch point until it is released. Note that it is possible for a widget to receive events for numerous touch points, and that multiple widgets may be receiving touch events at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 与QMouseEvent相似，Qt会在窗口小部件内的第一次按下时自动捕获每个触摸点，并且该窗口小部件将接收到该触摸点的所有更新，直到其被释放。请注意，窗口小部件可能会接收多个触摸点的事件，并且多个窗口小部件可能会同时接收触摸事件。

trans-unit.source: Similarly to QOpenGLContext, any actual Vulkan instance creation happens only when calling create(). This allows using QVulkanInstance as a plain member variable while retaining control over when to perform initialization.
trans-unit.target: 与QOpenGLContext相似，任何实际的Vulkan实例创建都仅在调用create（）时发生。这允许将QVulkanInstance用作普通成员变量，同时保留对何时执行初始化的控制。

trans-unit.source: Similarly to QOpenGLContext, any actual Vulkan instance creation happens only when calling create(). This allows using QVulkanInstance as a plain member variable while retaining control over when to perform initialization.

Similarly to QOpenGLWidget, QOpenGLWindow supports the Qt::AA_ShareOpenGLContexts attribute. When enabled, the OpenGL contexts of all QOpenGLWindow instances will share with each other. This allows accessing each other's shareable OpenGL resources.
trans-unit.target: 与QOpenGLWidget相似，QOpenGLWindow支持Qt :: AA_ShareOpenGLContexts属性。启用后，所有QOpenGLWindow实例的OpenGL上下文将彼此共享。这允许访问彼此的共享OpenGL资源。

trans-unit.source: Similarly to QOpenGLWidget, QOpenGLWindow supports the Qt::AA_ShareOpenGLContexts attribute. When enabled, the OpenGL contexts of all QOpenGLWindow instances will share with each other. This allows accessing each other's shareable OpenGL resources.

Similarly to QVulkanInstance, device extensions can be queried via supportedDeviceExtensions() before the actual initialization. Requesting an extension to be enabled is done via setDeviceExtensions(). Such calls must be made before the window becomes visible, that is, before calling show() or similar functions. Unsupported extension requests are gracefully ignored.
trans-unit.target: 与QVulkanInstance相似，可以在实际初始化之前通过supportedDeviceExtensions（）查询设备扩展。通过setDeviceExtensions（）请求启用扩展。必须在窗口可见之前（即，在调用show（）或类似函数之前）进行此类调用。不受支持的扩展请求将被正常忽略。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, a QVariant containing a sequential container will also return true for this function the
trans-unit.target: 同样，包含顺序容器的QVariant也会为此函数返回true，

trans-unit.source: Similarly, a colon in JavaScript can be either an object property value assignment, or a code label. Thus, initializing a var property with an object declaration can also require parentheses:
trans-unit.target: 同样,JavaScript中的冒号可以是对象属性值的赋值,也可以是代码标签。因此,用对象声明初始化一个var属性也可以需要括号。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, an invisible item cannot have focus, so if the item has focus when it becomes invisible, it will lose focus, and the focus is not regained by simply making the item visible again.
trans-unit.target: 同理,一个不可见的物品不可能有焦点,所以如果物品在变成不可见的时候有焦点,就会失去焦点,而焦点并不是简单地让物品再次可见就能恢复的。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, elements which are invisible (for example, the second tab in a tab widget, while the first tab is shown) but need to be initialized at startup time (for example, if the cost of instantiating the second tab takes too long to be able to do it only when the tab is activated), should have their "visible" property set to false, in order to avoid the cost of drawing them (although as previously explained, they will still incur the cost of any animations or bindings evaluation since they are still active).
trans-unit.target: 同样，不可见的元素（例如，标签小部件中的第二个标签，而第一个标签则显示），但需要在启动时进行初始化（例如，实例化第二个标签的成本过长而无法只能在激活选项卡时才能执行此操作），应将其“ visible”属性设置为 false ，以避免绘制它们的成本（尽管如前所述，它们仍然会产生任何动画或绑定评估的成本因为它们仍然处于活动状态）。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if UseFloat16 is specified, this function will try to use half-precision (qfloat16) floating point if the conversion to that results in no loss of precision. This is always true for infinities and NaN.
trans-unit.target: 同样，如果指定UseFloat16，则该函数将尝试使用半精度（ qfloat16 ）浮点，如果对该点的转换不会导致精度损失。对于无穷大和NaN总是如此。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if UseFloat16 is specified, this function will try to use half-precision (binary16) floating point if the conversion to that results in no loss of precision. This is always true for infinities and NaN.
trans-unit.target: 同样，如果指定了UseFloat16，则该函数将尝试使用半精度（binary16）浮点数，如果对该点的转换不会导致精度损失。对于无穷大和NaN总是如此。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if a C++ type uses a QDateTime for a property type or method parameter, the value can be created as a JavaScript Date object in QML, and is automatically converted to a QDateTime value when it is passed to C++.
trans-unit.target: 同样，如果C ++类型将QDateTime用作属性类型或方法参数，则可以将该值创建为QML中的JavaScript Date 对象，并在将其传递给C ++时自动转换为QDateTime值。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if a C++ type uses a QVariantList or QVariantMap type for a property type or method parameter, the value can be created as a JavaScript array or object in QML, and is automatically converted to a QVariantList or QVariantMap when it is passed to C++.
trans-unit.target: 同样，如果C ++类型对属性类型或方法参数使用QVariantList或QVariantMap类型，则可以将其创建为QML中的JavaScript数组或对象，并在将其传递给C ++时自动将其转换为QVariantList或QVariantMap。

trans-unit.source: Simple radial gradients interpolate colors between a focal point and end points on a circle surrounding it. Extended radial gradients interpolate colors between a focal circle and a center circle. Points outside the cone defined by the two circles will be transparent. For simple radial gradients the focal point is adjusted to lie inside the center circle, whereas the focal point can have any position in an extended radial gradient.
trans-unit.target: 简单的径向渐变在一个焦点和它周围圆上的端点之间插值颜色。扩展的径向梯度在焦点圆和中心圆之间插补颜色。两个圆所定义的圆锥外的点将是透明的。对于简单的径向梯度,焦点被调整为位于中心圆内,而在扩展的径向梯度中,焦点可以有任何位置。

Since QAbstractProxyModel and its subclasses are derived from QAbstractItemModel, much of the same advice about subclassing normal models also applies to proxy models. In addition, it is worth noting that many of the default implementations of functions in this class are written so that they call the equivalent functions in the relevant source model. This simple proxying mechanism may need to be overridden for source models with more complex behavior; for example, if the source model provides a custom hasChildren() implementation, you should also provide one in the proxy model.
trans-unit.target: 由于QAbstractProxyModel及其子类是从QAbstractItemModel派生的，因此有关对普通模型进行子类化的许多建议也适用于代理模型。另外，值得注意的是，编写了此类的许多默认函数实现，以便它们在相关源模型中调用等效函数。对于行为更复杂的源模型，可能需要重写这种简单的代理机制。例如，如果源模型提供了自定义的hasChildren（）实现，则还应该在代理模型中提供一个。

trans-unit.source: Since QAnimationGroup inherits from QAbstractAnimation, you can combine groups, and easily construct complex animation graphs. You can query QAbstractAnimation for the group it belongs to (using the group() function).
trans-unit.target: 由于QAnimationGroup继承自QAbstractAnimation，因此您可以组合组，并轻松构造复杂的动画图。您可以查询QAbstractAnimation所属的组（使用group（）函数）。

trans-unit.source: Since QByteArray is not a QIODevice subclass, internally a QBuffer is created to wrap the byte array.

trans-unit.source: Since QCommonStyle inherits QStyle, all of its functions are fully documented in the QStyle documentation.
trans-unit.target: 由于QCommonStyle继承了QStyle，因此其所有功能都在QStyle文档中进行了充分记录。

trans-unit.source: Since QDial inherits from QAbstractSlider, the dial behaves in a similar way to a slider. When wrapping() is false (the default setting) there is no real difference between a slider and a dial. They both share the same signals, slots and member functions. Which one you use depends on the expectations of your users and on the type of application.
trans-unit.target: 由于QDial继承自QAbstractSlider，因此刻度盘的行为与滑块类似。当wrap（）为假（默认设置）时，滑块和拨盘之间没有真正的区别。它们都共享相同的信号，插槽和成员功能。您使用哪一种取决于用户的期望和应用程序的类型。

trans-unit.source: Since restorePurchases() may, on some platforms, cause the user to be prompted for their password, it should usually be called as a reaction to user input. For instance applications can have a button in the UI which will trigger restorePurchases() and which users can hit manually if they have reinstalled the application (or installed it on a new device) and need to unlock the features that they have previously paid for.
trans-unit.target: 由于restorePurchases（）在某些平台上可能会导致提示用户输入密码，因此通常应将其称为对用户输入的反应。例如，应用程序可以在UI中具有一个按钮，该按钮将触发restorePurchases（），并且如果用户已经重新安装了该应用程序（或将其安装在新设备上）并且需要解锁他们以前付费的功能，则这些用户可以手动命中。

trans-unit.source: Since QJsonArray is implicitly shared, the copy is shallow as long as the object doesn't get modified.

trans-unit.source: Since QString uses the Unicode encoding internally, every language in the world can be processed transparently using familiar text processing operations. Also, since all Qt functions that present text to the user take a QString as a parameter, there is no char * to QString conversion overhead.
trans-unit.target: 由于QString在内部使用Unicode编码，因此可以使用熟悉的文本处理操作透明地处理世界上的每种语言。同样，由于所有向用户显示文本的Qt函数都将QString作为参数，因此没有 char * 到QString的转换开销。

trans-unit.source: Since QSvgWidget is a subclass of QWidget, SVG drawings are rendered using the properties of the display. More control can be exercised over the rendering process with the QSvgRenderer class, as this can be used to paint onto other paint devices, such as QImage and QGLWidget. The renderer used by the widget can be obtained with the renderer() function.
trans-unit.target: 由于QSvgWidget是QWidget的子类，因此将使用显示的属性来渲染SVG绘图。使用QSvgRenderer类可以对呈现过程进行更多控制，因为它可以用于在其他绘制设备（例如QImage和QGLWidget）上进行绘制。小部件使用的渲染器可以通过renderer（）函数获得。

trans-unit.source: Since QTcpSocket inherits QIODevice, you can use it with QTextStream and QDataStream. When reading from a QTcpSocket, you must make sure that enough data is available by calling QTcpSocket::bytesAvailable() beforehand.
trans-unit.target: 由于QTcpSocket继承了QIODevice，因此可以将其与QTextStream和QDataStream一起使用。从QTcpSocket读取时，必须通过事先调用QTcpSocket :: bytesAvailable（）来确保有足够的数据可用。

trans-unit.source: Since QWidget is a subclass of QPaintDevice, subclasses can be used to display custom content that is composed using a series of painting operations with an instance of the QPainter class. This approach contrasts with the canvas-style approach used by the Graphics View Framework where items are added to a scene by the application and are rendered by the framework itself.
trans-unit.target: 由于QWidget是QPaintDevice的子类，因此可以使用子类来显示自定义内容，该内容是通过一系列带有QPainter类实例的绘画操作组成的。这种方法与“ 图形视图框架”所使用的画布样式方法形成对比，在图形视图框架中，项目由应用程序添加到场景中，并由框架本身进行渲染。

trans-unit.source: Since Action presents a user interface action, it is intended to be assigned to a MenuItem, ToolButton, or any other control that inherits AbstractButton. For keyboard shortcuts, the simpler Shortcut type is more appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 由于Action提供了用户界面操作，因此应将其分配给MenuItem，ToolButton或继承AbstractButton的任何其他控件。对于键盘快捷方式，更简单的“ 快捷方式”类型更合适。

trans-unit.source: Since QAnimationGroup inherits from QAbstractAnimation, you can combine groups, and easily construct complex animation graphs. You can query QAbstractAnimation for the group it belongs to (using the group() function).

Since QAudioBuffers can share the actual sample data, calling this function will result in a deep copy being made if there are any other buffers using the sample. You should avoid calling this unless you really need to modify the data.
trans-unit.target: 由于QAudioBuffers可以共享实际的样本数据,所以如果有任何其他缓冲区使用样本,调用这个函数将导致深度复制。你应该避免调用这个函数,除非你真的需要修改数据。

trans-unit.source: Since QCommonStyle inherits QStyle, all of its functions are fully documented in the QStyle documentation.

Since QDial inherits from QAbstractSlider, the dial behaves in a similar way to a slider. When wrapping() is false (the default setting) there is no real difference between a slider and a dial. They both share the same signals, slots and member functions. Which one you use depends on the expectations of your users and on the type of application.

Since QDoc version 5.12, \code command accepts also optional parameters. Parameters are useful for injecting simple strings into the code snippet. To inject a string to a specific location in the snippet, add a backslash followed by a digit (1..8). The digits correspond with the order of the argument list, where arguments are separated by spaces.
trans-unit.target: 从QDoc 5.12版本开始,code命令也接受可选的参数。参数对于在代码片段中注入简单的字符串非常有用。要在代码段中的特定位置注入一个字符串,请在后面添加一个反斜杠和一个数字(1...8)。数字与参数列表的顺序相对应,其中参数用空格分隔。

trans-unit.source: Since QGraphicsWidget resembles QWidget and has similar API, it is easier to port a widget from QWidget to QGraphicsWidget, instead of QGraphicsItem.
Since QJsonArray is implicitly shared, the copy is shallow as long as the object doesn't get modified.
Since QJsonObject is implicitly shared, the copy is shallow as long as the object does not get modified.
Since QMediaPlayer is a QMediaObject, you can use several of the QMediaObject functions for things like:
Since QNetworkProxyFactory is an abstract class, you cannot create objects of type QNetworkProxyFactory directly.
Since QPrinter can print to any QPrintEngine subclass, it is possible to extend printing support to cover new types of printing subsystem by subclassing QPrintEngine and reimplementing its interface.
Since QSoundEffect requires slightly more resources to achieve lower latency playback, the platform may limit the number of simultaneously playing sound effects.

Since QSvgWidget is a subclass of QWidget, SVG drawings are rendered using the properties of the display. More control can be exercised over the rendering process with the QSvgRenderer class, as this can be used to paint onto other paint devices, such as QImage and QGLWidget. The renderer used by the widget can be obtained with the renderer() function.

Since QWidget is a subclass of QPaintDevice, subclasses can be used to display custom content that is composed using a series of painting operations with an instance of the QPainter class. This approach contrasts with the canvas-style approach used by the Graphics View Framework where items are added to a scene by the application and are rendered by the framework itself.
Since Qt 4.0, QWidget automatically double-buffers its painting, so there is no need to write double-buffering code in paintEvent() to avoid flicker.
trans-unit.target: 从Qt 4.0开始，QWidget会自动对其绘画进行双缓冲，因此无需在paintEvent（）中编写双缓冲代码来避免闪烁。

trans-unit.source: Since Qt 4.0, QWidget automatically double-buffers its painting, so there is no need to write double-buffering code in paintEvent() to avoid flicker.
trans-unit.target: 从Qt 4.0开始，QWidget自动对其绘画进行双缓冲，因此无需在paintEvent（）中编写双缓冲代码来避免闪烁。

trans-unit.source: Since Qt 4.0, QWidget automatically double-buffers its painting, so there is no need to write double-buffering code in paintEvent() to avoid flicker.

Since Qt 4.1, the Qt::WA_ContentsPropagated widget attribute has been deprecated. Instead, the contents of parent widgets are propagated by default to each of their children as long as Qt::WA_PaintOnScreen is not set. Custom widgets can be written to take advantage of this feature by updating irregular regions (to create non-rectangular child widgets), or painting with colors that have less than full alpha component. The following diagram shows how attributes and properties of a custom widget can be fine-tuned to achieve different effects.
trans-unit.target: 从Qt 4.1开始，不建议使用Qt :: WA_ContentsPropagated小部件属性。而是默认情况下，只要未设置Qt :: WA_PaintOnScreen，父窗口小部件的内容就会传播到它们的每个子窗口。可以编写自定义窗口小部件以利用此功能，方法是更新不规则区域（以创建非矩形子窗口小部件），或者使用少于完整alpha分量的颜色进行绘画。下图显示了如何微调自定义窗口小部件的属性和属性以实现不同的效果。

trans-unit.source: Since Qt 4.1, the contents of parent widgets are also propagated to standard Qt widgets. This can lead to some unexpected results if the parent widget is decorated in a non-standard way, as shown in the diagram below.
trans-unit.target: 自 Qt 4.1 以来,父部件的内容也会传播到标准 Qt 部件。如果父部件以非标准方式装饰,这可能会导致一些意想不到的结果,如下图所示。

trans-unit.source: Since Qt 4.1, the contents of parent widgets are propagated by default to each of their children as long as Qt::WA_PaintOnScreen is not set. Custom widgets can be written to take advantage of this feature by updating irregular regions (to create non-rectangular child widgets), or painting with colors that have less than full alpha component. The following diagram shows how attributes and properties of a custom widget can be fine-tuned to achieve different effects.

trans-unit.source: Since Qt 4.4, double-clicking on the object's name allows you to change the object's name with the in-place editor.
trans-unit.target: 从Qt 4.4开始,双击对象的名称,就可以用原地编辑器更改对象的名称。

trans-unit.source: Since Qt 4.4, it is possible to preview forms with various skins - default skins, skins created with Qt Style Sheets or device skins. This feature simulates the effect of calling QApplication::setStyleSheet() in the application.
trans-unit.target: 从Qt 4.4开始，可以预览具有各种外观的表单-默认外观，使用Qt样式表创建的外观或设备外观。此功能模拟在应用程序中调用 QApplication::setStyleSheet() 的效果。

trans-unit.target: 从Qt 4.4开始,可以查看由用户界面编译器(uic)生成的代码。

trans-unit.source: Since Qt 4.4, there are two delegate classes: QItemDelegate and QStyledItemDelegate. However, the default delegate is QStyledItemDelegate. These two classes are independent alternatives to painting and providing editors for items in views. The difference between them is that QStyledItemDelegate uses the current style to paint its items. We therefore recommend using QStyledItemDelegate as the base class when implementing custom delegates or when working with Qt style sheets. The code required for either class should be equal unless the custom delegate needs to use the style for drawing.
trans-unit.target: 从Qt 4.4开始，有两个委托类：QItemDelegate和QStyledItemDelegate。但是，默认委托是QStyledItemDelegate。这两类是绘画的独立选择，并为视图中的项目提供编辑器。它们之间的区别在于QStyledItemDelegate使用当前样式来绘制其项目。因此，在实现自定义委托或使用Qt样式表时，建议将QStyledItemDelegate用作基类。除非自定义委托需要使用绘制样式，否则两个类所需的代码应相等。

trans-unit.source: Since Qt 4.4, there are two delegate classes: QItemDelegate and QStyledItemDelegate. However, the default delegate is QStyledItemDelegate. These two classes are independent alternatives to painting and providing editors for items in views. The difference between them is that QStyledItemDelegate uses the current style to paint its items. We therefore recommend using QStyledItemDelegate as the base class when implementing custom delegates or when working with Qt style sheets. The code required for either class should be equal unless the custom delegate needs to use the style for drawing.

Since Qt 4.4, there are two delegate classes: QItemDelegate and QStyledItemDelegate. However, the default delegate is QStyledItemDelegate. These two classes are independent alternatives to painting and providing editors for items in views. The difference between them is that QStyledItemDelegate uses the current style to paint its items. We therefore recommend using QStyledItemDelegate as the base class when implementing custom delegates or when working with Qt style sheets. The code required for either class should be equal unless the custom delegate needs to use the style for drawing.
Since Qt 4.5, Qt style sheets fully supports macOS.
trans-unit.target: 从Qt 4.5开始，Qt样式表完全支持macOS。

Since Qt 4.5, it has been possible to create windows with translucent regions on window systems that support compositing.
trans-unit.target: 从Qt 4.5开始,可以在支持合成的窗口系统上创建具有半透明区域的窗口。

trans-unit.source: Since Qt 4.5, the Object Inspector displays the layout state of the containers. The broken layout icon ###ICON is displayed if there is something wrong with the layouts.
trans-unit.target: 从Qt 4.5开始，对象检查器将显示容器的布局状态。如果布局有问题，则显示破碎的布局图标### ICON。

trans-unit.source: Since Qt 4.6, restore the old painting algorithm that calls QGraphicsView::drawItems() and QGraphicsScene::drawItems(). To be used only for compatibility with old code.
trans-unit.target: 自Qt 4.6起,恢复调用QGraphicsView::drawItems()和QGraphicsScene::drawItems()的旧绘画算法。仅用于兼容旧代码。

trans-unit.source: Since Qt 4.7, this flag allows you to fine-tune gesture event propagation. By setting the flag when grabbing a gesture all ignored partial gestures will propagate to their parent items.
trans-unit.target: 从Qt 4.7开始，此标志允许您微调手势事件的传播。通过在抓取手势时设置标志，所有忽略的部分手势都将传播到其父项。

trans-unit.source: Since Qt 5.0, setUrls also exports the urls as plain text, if setText was not called before, to make it possible to drop them into any lineedit and text editor.
trans-unit.target: 从Qt 5.0开始，如果以前未调用过setText，则setUrls还将这些URL导出为纯文本，以便可以将它们放入任何lineedit和文本编辑器中。

trans-unit.source: Since Qt 5.12, QStyle::SH_SpinBox_StepModifier can be used to select which Qt::KeyboardModifier increases the step rate. Qt::NoModifier disables this feature.
trans-unit.target: 从Qt 5.12开始，可以使用QStyle :: SH_SpinBox_StepModifier选择哪个Qt :: KeyboardModifier提高步进率。Qt :: NoModifier禁用此功能。

trans-unit.source: Since Qt 5.12, vertical and horizontal linear gradients can be applied to items. If you need to apply angled gradients, a combination of rotation and clipping can be applied to the relevant items. Alternatively, consider using QtQuick.Shapes::LinearGradient or QtGraphicalEffects::LinearGradient. These approaches can all introduce additional performance requirements for your application.
trans-unit.target: 从Qt 5.12开始，可以将垂直和水平线性渐变应用于项目。如果需要应用成角度的渐变，则可以将旋转和修剪的组合应用于相关项目。或者，考虑使用QtQuick .Shapes :: LinearGradient或QtGraphicalEffects :: LinearGradient。这些方法都会为您的应用程序引入其他性能要求。

trans-unit.source: Since Qt 5.12, vertical and horizontal linear gradients can be applied to items. If you need to apply angled gradients, a combination of rotation and clipping can be applied to the relevant items. Alternatively, consider using QtQuick.Shapes::LinearGradient or QtGraphicalEffects::LinearGradient. These approaches can all introduce additional performance requirements for your application.
Since Qt 5.12.2, the url scheme gst-pipeline provides custom pipelines for the GStreamer backend.

Since Qt 5.13, if you want to hide a specific column, you can return 0 from the columnWidthProvider for that column. Likewise, you can return 0 from the rowHeightProvider to hide a row. If you return a negative number, TableView will fall back to calculate the size based on the delegate items.
trans-unit.target: 从Qt 5.13开始，如果要隐藏特定的列，则可以从columnWidthProvider返回该列的 0 。同样，您可以从rowHeightProvider返回0 以隐藏行。如果返回负数，TableView将回退以根据委托项计算大小。

trans-unit.source: Since Qt 5.13, if you want to hide a specific column, you can return 0 from the columnWidthProvider for that column. Likewise, you can return 0 from the rowHeightProvider to hide a row. If you return a negative number, TableView will fall back to calculate the size based on the delegate items.
Since Qt 5.13, if you want to hide a specific column, you can return 0 width for that column. If you return a negative number, TableView calculates the width based on the delegate items.

Since Qt 5.13, if you want to hide a specific column, you can return 0 width for that column. If you return a negative number, TableView will fall back to calculate the width based on the delegate items.
trans-unit.target: 从Qt 5.13开始，如果要隐藏特定的列，则可以为该列返回 0 宽度。如果返回负数，TableView将回退以根据委托项计算宽度。

trans-unit.source: Since Qt 5.13, if you want to hide a specific row, you can return 0 height for that row. If you return a negative number, TableView calculates the height based on the delegate items.
Since Qt 5.13, if you want to hide a specific row, you can return 0 height for that row. If you return a negative number, TableView will fall back to calculate the height based on the delegate items.
trans-unit.target: 从Qt 5.13开始，如果要隐藏特定的行，则可以为该行返回 0 height。如果返回负数，TableView将回退以根据委托项计算高度。

trans-unit.source: Since Qt 5.4, this value forces QOpenGLWidget and QQuickWidget to be drawn last, on top of other widgets. Ignored for other type of widgets. Setting this attribute breaks the stacking order, but allows having a semi-transparent OpenGL widget with other widgets visible underneath. It is strongly recommended to call update() on the widget's top-level window after enabling or disabling this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 从Qt 5.4开始，此值将强制将QOpenGLWidget和QQuickWidget绘制在其他小部件之上。忽略其他类型的小部件。设置此属性会破坏堆栈顺序，但允许使用半透明的OpenGL小部件，并在其下方可见其他小部件。强烈建议在启用或禁用此属性后在窗口小部件的顶级窗口上调用update（）。

trans-unit.source: Since Qt 5.7, only secure origins such as HTTPS have been able to request Geolocation features. This provides an override to allow non secure origins to access Geolocation again.
trans-unit.target: 自 Qt 5.7 以来,只有安全的起源(如 HTTPS)才能请求 Geolocation 功能。这就提供了一个覆盖,允许非安全来源再次访问地理位置。

trans-unit.source: Since Qt 5.7, only secure origins such as HTTPS have been able to request Geolocation features. This provides an override to allow non secure origins to access Geolocation again. Disabled by default. (Added in Qt 5.9)
trans-unit.target: 自 Qt 5.7 以来,只有安全的起源(如 HTTPS)才能请求 Geolocation 功能。这提供了一个覆盖功能,允许非安全来源的用户再次访问Geolocation。默认情况下是禁用的。(在Qt 5.9中添加)

trans-unit.source: Since Qt 5.8, Qt Quick dialogs can be customized by connecting to the WebEngineView::authenticationDialogRequested(), WebEngineView::javaScriptDialogRequested(), WebEngineView::colorDialogRequested(), WebEngineView::fileDialogRequested(), and WebEngineView::formValidationMessageRequested() signals. Since Qt Multimedia for iOS uses the camera, the Info.plist assigned to QMAKE_INFO_PLIST in the project file must contain the key NSCameraUsageDescription. Otherwise the application will abort on startup. See Info.plist documentation from Apple for more information regarding this key.

trans-unit.source: Since QtRO is a peer-to-peer network, to acquire() a valid Replica, the replica's node needs to be connected to the node that hosts its Source. A host node is a node that allows other nodes to connect to it, which is accomplished by giving hosts unique addresses. This address is provided to the QRemoteObjectHost constructor or set by the setHostUrl method. The node from which a replica is requested must establish the connection to the host node, to initialize the replica and keep it up to date.

Since dock widgets are container widgets, they can be added to a form in the usual way. trans-unit.source: Since each view transition is run once for each item affected by the transition, the ViewTransition properties can be used within a transition to define custom behavior for each item's transition. Since elements, text nodes, comments, processing instructions, etc., cannot exist outside the context of a document, the document class also contains the factory functions needed to create these objects. The node objects created have an ownerDocument() function which associates them with the document within whose context they were created. The DOM classes that will be used most often are QDomNode, QDomDocument, QDomElement and QDomText.
trans-unit.target: 由于元素，文本节点，注释，处理指令等不能在文档上下文之外存在，因此文档类还包含创建这些对象所需的工厂功能。创建的节点对象具有ownerDocument（）函数，该函数将它们与在其上下文中创建的文档相关联。最常使用的DOM类是QDomNode，QDomDocument，QDomElement和QDomText。

trans-unit.source: Since elements, text nodes, comments, processing instructions, etc., cannot exist outside the context of a document, the document class also contains the factory functions needed to create these objects. The node objects created have an ownerDocument() function which associates them with the document within whose context they were created. The DOM classes that will be used most often are QDomNode, QDomDocument, QDomElement and QDomText.

Since foreach creates a copy of the container, using a non-const reference for the variable does not allow you to modify the original container. It only affects the copy, which is probably not what you want.

trans-unit.source: Since height maps do not contain values for X or Z axes, those values need to be given separately using minXValue, maxXValue, minZValue, and maxZValue properties. X-value corresponds to image horizontal direction and Z-value to the vertical. Setting any of these properties triggers asynchronous re-resolving of any existing height map.
trans-unit.target: 由于高度图不包含X轴或Z轴的值，因此需要使用minXValue，maxXValue，minZValue和maxZValue属性分别给出这些值。X值对应于图像水平方向，Z值对应于垂直方向。设置任何这些属性都会触发异步重新解析任何现有的高度图。

trans-unit.source: Since height maps do not contain values for X or Z axes, those values need to be given separately using minXValue, maxXValue, minZValue, and maxZValue properties. trans-unit.source: Since sensor backends are created on demand, the sensor plugin is loaded and asked to register the sensor backends it handles. The plugin should implement QSensorPluginInterface::registerSensors() and call QSensorManager::registerBackend() to register available backends. Typically the plugin will also inherit from QSensorBackendFactory and implement QSensorBackendFactory::createBackend() in order to instantiate backends it has registered.
trans-unit.target: 由于传感器后端是按需创建的，因此会加载传感器插件，并要求注册其处理的传感器后端。该插件应实现QSensorPluginInterface :: registerSensors（）并调用QSensorManager :: registerBackend（）来注册可用的后端。通常，该插件还将继承自QSensorBackendFactory并实现QSensorBackendFactory :: createBackend（）以便实例化已注册的后端。

trans-unit.source: Since sharing data over NFC is effectively a data pipe between two processes (one on the sender and one of the receiver), the application developer should only create a single instance of QNearFieldShareManager per application. This avoids the possibility that different parts of the same application attempt to all consume data transferred over NFC.
trans-unit.target: 由于通过NFC共享数据实际上是两个进程之间的数据管道（一个在发送者上，一个在接收者上），因此应用程序开发人员应仅为每个应用程序创建一个QNearFieldShareManager实例。这避免了同一应用程序的不同部分尝试全部消耗通过NFC传输的数据的可能性。

trans-unit.source: Since sharing data over NFC is effectively a data pipe between two processes (one on the sender and one of the receiver), the application developer should only create a single instance of QNearFieldShareManager per application. This avoids the possibility that different parts of the same application attempt to all consume data transferred over NFC.

Since slots are normal member functions, they follow the normal C++ rules when called directly. However, as slots, they can be invoked by any component, regardless of its access level, via a signal-slot connection. This means that a signal emitted from an instance of an arbitrary class can cause a private slot to be invoked in an instance of an unrelated class.
trans-unit.target: 由于槽是正常的成员函数,所以当直接调用时,它们遵循正常的C++规则。然而,作为槽,它们可以被任何组件调用,不管它的访问级别如何,通过信号-槽连接。这意味着,一个任意类的实例发出的信号可以导致一个私有槽在一个不相关的类的实例中被调用。

trans-unit.source: Since the WorkerScript.onMessage() function is run in a separate thread, the JavaScript file is evaluated in a context separate from the main QML engine. Since the handler classes only describe interfaces you must implement all the functions. We provide the QXmlDefaultHandler class to make this easier: it implements a default behavior (do nothing) for all functions, so you can subclass it and just implement the functions you are interested in.

trans-unit.source: Since the maximum numbered place marker value is 99, 50 replaces %32.
trans-unit.target: 由于最大的位置标记数字值为99，因此 50 将替换 %32 。

trans-unit.source: Since the model is non-hierarchical, we can safely ignore the model index corresponding to the parent item. By default, models derived from QAbstractListModel only contain one column, so we do not need to reimplement the columnCount() function.
trans-unit.target: 由于模型是非分层的，因此我们可以安全地忽略与父项相对应的模型索引。默认情况下，从QAbstractListModel派生的模型仅包含一列，因此我们无需重新实现columnCount（）函数。

trans-unit.source: Since the model provides a more specialized interface than QAbstractItemModel, it is not suitable for use with tree views, although it can be used to provide data to a QListView. If you need to represent a simple list of items, and only need a model to contain a single column of data, subclassing the QAbstractListModel may be more appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 由于该模型提供的接口比QAbstractItemModel更为专用，因此尽管可用于向QListView提供数据，但它不适用于树视图。如果您需要表示一个简单的项目列表，并且只需要一个模型来包含单个数据列，则对QAbstractListModel进行子类化可能更合适。

trans-unit.source: Since the model provides a more specialized interface than QAbstractItemModel, it is not suitable for use with tree views; you will need to subclass QAbstractItemModel if you want to provide a model for that purpose. If you need to use a number of list models to manage data, it may be more appropriate to subclass QAbstractTableModel instead.
trans-unit.target: 由于该模型提供的接口比QAbstractItemModel更专业，因此不适合与树视图一起使用。如果要为此目的提供模型，则需要子类QAbstractItemModel。如果您需要使用许多列表模型来管理数据，则更合适的是将QAbstractTableModel子类化。

trans-unit.source: Since the model represents a one-dimensional structure, the rowCount() function returns the total number of items in the model. The columnCount() function is implemented for interoperability with all kinds of views, but by default informs views that the model contains only one column.
trans-unit.target: 由于模型表示一维结构，因此rowCount（）函数返回模型中的项目总数。该信息columnCount（）函数用于各种意见的互操作性实现，但默认情况下INFORMS的观点，该模型只包含一列。

trans-unit.source: Since the release and debug libraries are inside the framework, the app is simply linked against the framework. Then when you run in the debugger, you will get either the release version or the debug version, depending on whether you set DYLD_IMAGE_SUFFIX. If you don't set it, you get the release version by default (i.e., non _debug). If you set DYLD_IMAGE_SUFFIX=_debug, you get the debug version.
trans-unit.target: 由于发布和调试库位于框架内部，因此仅将应用程序链接到框架即可。然后，当您在调试器中运行时，将根据您是否设置 DYLD_IMAGE_SUFFIX 获得发行版或调试版。如果未设置，则默认情况下会获得发行版本（即，非_debug）。如果设置 DYLD_IMAGE_SUFFIX=_debug ，则会获得调试版本。

trans-unit.source: Since the rotation of the reading values is based on the screen orientation, Z values will never change, as the Z axis is perpendicular to the screen. As screen orientation changes in 90 degree steps, rotating the reading values is also done in steps of 90 degrees.
trans-unit.target: 由于读数值的旋转是基于屏幕方向,Z值永远不会改变,因为Z轴垂直于屏幕。由于屏幕方向以90度为单位变化,旋转读数值也以90度为单位。

trans-unit.source: Since the sequence is modified in place, QtConcurrent::filter() does not return any results via QFuture. However, you can still use QFuture and QFutureWatcher to monitor the status of the filter.
trans-unit.target: 由于已在适当位置修改了序列，因此QtConcurrent :: filter（）不会通过QFuture返回任何结果。但是，您仍然可以使用QFuture和QFutureWatcher监视过滤器的状态。

trans-unit.source: Since the sequence is modified in place, QtConcurrent::map() does not return any results via QFuture. However, you can still use QFuture and QFutureWatcher to monitor the status of the map.
trans-unit.target: 由于已在适当位置修改了序列，因此QtConcurrent :: map（）不会通过QFuture返回任何结果。但是，您仍然可以使用QFuture和QFutureWatcher监视地图的状态。

trans-unit.source: Since the text stream uses a buffer, you should not read from the stream using the implementation of a superclass. For instance, if you have a QFile and read from it directly using QFile::readLine() instead of using the stream, the text stream's internal position will be out of sync with the file's position.
trans-unit.target: 由于文本流使用缓冲区，因此不应使用超类的实现来读取流。例如，如果您有一个QFile并使用QFile :: readLine（）而不是使用流直接读取它，则文本流的内部位置将与文件位置不同步。

trans-unit.source: Since the top level widget is named Form, this results in a Python class named Ui_Form being generated. It provides a function setupUi(), taking the widget as parameter, which is called to create the UI elements:

Since the value is changed directly, this bypasses Qt's meta-object system and the QML engine is not made aware of the property change. This means property bindings to buttonText would not be updated, and any onButtonTextChanged handlers would not be called.
trans-unit.target: 由于值是直接更改的，因此绕过了Qt的元对象系统，并且QML引擎没有意识到属性的更改。这意味着不会更新对 buttonText 的属性绑定，并且不会调用任何 onButtonTextChanged 处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Since the view manages the editor widgets for the delegate, we only need to update the model with the contents of the editor supplied. In this case, we ensure that the spin box is up-to-date, and update the model with the value it contains using the index specified.
trans-unit.target: 由于视图为委托人管理编辑器小部件,我们只需要用提供的编辑器的内容更新模型。在这种情况下,我们确保旋转框是最新的,并使用它所包含的值使用指定的索引更新模型。

trans-unit.source: Since the year is not a whole number of days long, some years are longer than others. The difference may be a whole month or just a single day; the details vary between calendars.

Since there is no standard way to copy and paste files between applications on X11, various MIME types and conventions are currently in use. For instance, Nautilus expects files to be supplied with a x-special/gnome-copied-files MIME type with data beginning with the cut/copy action, a newline character, and the URL of the file.
trans-unit.target: 由于没有在X11上的应用程序之间复制和粘贴文件的标准方法，因此当前正在使用各种MIME类型和约定。例如，Nautilus期望为文件提供 x-special/gnome-copied-files MIME类型，其数据以剪切/复制操作，换行符和文件的URL开头。

trans-unit.source: Since there is no tree structure for branch indicators, we only present an image of a tree in the Java style. Each state is marked in the image with a rectangle in a specific color (i.e., the rectangles are not bounding rectangles). All combinations of states you must be aware of are represented in the image.
trans-unit.target: 由于分支指示器没有树状结构,我们只用Java风格呈现一棵树的图像。每个状态在图像中用特定颜色的矩形标记(即矩形不是边界矩形)。所有你必须注意的状态组合都在图像中表示。

trans-unit.source: Since version 2.0 of the virtual keyboard, input methods can consume touch input data from touch screens or other input devices. This allows integration of a handwriting recognition engine seamlessly to the virtual keyboard, without any changes to the existing keyboard layouts (as the virtual keyboard already provides the handwriting keyboard layouts for most languages).
trans-unit.target: 自虚拟键盘2.0版本起,输入法可以消耗来自触摸屏或其他输入设备的触摸输入数据。这样就可以将手写识别引擎无缝集成到虚拟键盘中,而无需更改现有的键盘布局(因为虚拟键盘已经为大多数语言提供了手写键盘布局)。

trans-unit.source: Slots are implemented by the application programmer. Here is a possible implementation of the Counter::setValue() slot:
trans-unit.target: 插槽由应用程序程序员实现。这是 Counter::setValue() 插槽的可能实现：

trans-unit.source: Slots can be of three kinds:
trans-unit.target: 老虎机可以分为三种。

trans-unit.source: Slots can be used for receiving signals, but they are also normal member functions. Just as an object does not know if anything receives its signals, a slot does not know if it has any signals connected to it. This ensures that truly independent components can be created with Qt.
trans-unit.target: 槽可以用来接收信号,但它们也是正常的成员函数。就像一个对象不知道是否有任何东西接收它的信号一样,一个槽不知道是否有任何信号连接到它。这就保证了用Qt可以创建真正独立的组件。

trans-unit.source: Slots can have one parameter of type const QDBusMessage &, which must appear at the end of the input parameter list, before any output parameters. This parameter, if present, will be initialized with a copy of the current message being processed, which allows the callee to obtain information about the caller, such as its connection name.
trans-unit.target: 插槽可以具有一个类型为 const QDBusMessage & 参数，该参数必须出现在输入参数列表的末尾，在任何输出参数之前。如果存在此参数，将使用正在处理的当前消息的副本进行初始化，这将允许被调用方获取有关调用方的信息，例如其连接名称。

trans-unit.source: Slots in D-Bus adaptors are declared just like normal, public slots, but their parameters must follow certain rules (see The Qt D-Bus Type System for more information). Slots whose parameters do not follow those rules or that are not public will not be accessible via D-Bus.

Slots in D-Bus adaptors are declared just like normal, public slots, but their parameters must follow certain rules (see The Qt D-Bus Type System for more information). Slots whose parameters do not follow those rules or that are not public will not be accessible via D-Bus.
trans-unit.target: D-Bus适配器中的插槽与普通的公共插槽一样被声明，但是它们的参数必须遵循某些规则（有关更多信息，请参见Qt D-Bus类型系统）。参数不符合这些规则或不公开的插槽将无法通过D-Bus访问。

trans-unit.source: So, while the ViewTransition.item, ViewTransition.index and ViewTransition.destination values vary for each individual transition that is run, the ViewTransition.targetIndexes and ViewTransition.targetItems values are the same for every add and displaced transition that is triggered by a particular add operation.

trans-unit.source: Some OpenVG engines are implemented on top of OpenGL. This will be detected at configure time and QMAKE_LIBS_OPENGL will be implicitly added to QMAKE_LIBS_OPENVG wherever the OpenVG libraries are linked.
trans-unit.target: 一些OpenVG引擎是在OpenGL之上实现的。这将在配置时检测到，并且QMAKE_LIBS_OPENGL将隐式地添加到QMAKE_LIBS_OPENVG所链接的OpenVG库中。

trans-unit.source: Some OpenVG engines are implemented on top of OpenGL. This will be detected at configure time and QMAKE_LIBS_OPENGL will be implicitly added to QMAKE_LIBS_OPENVG wherever the OpenVG libraries are linked.
Some API features are not available on all platforms. The QNetworkConfigurationManager::Capability should be used to detect platform features at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 某些API功能并非在所有平台上都可用。该QNetworkConfigurationManager ::能力应该用来在运行时检测平台功能。

trans-unit.source: Some ActiveX controls might be unstable when connected to an event sink. To get OLE events you must use standard COM methods to register your own event sink. Use queryInterface() to get access to the raw COM object.
trans-unit.target: 连接到事件接收器时，某些ActiveX控件可能不稳定。若要获取OLE事件，您必须使用标准的COM方法来注册您自己的事件接收器。使用queryInterface（）可以访问原始COM对象。

trans-unit.source: Some ActiveX controls might be unstable when used with OLE automation. Use standard COM methods to use those controls through the COM interfaces provided by queryInterface().
trans-unit.target: 与OLE自动化一起使用时，某些ActiveX控件可能不稳定。使用标准的COM方法通过queryInterface（）提供的COM接口使用这些控件。

trans-unit.source: Some QML types are implicitly uncreatable, in particular types exposed with QML_ANONYMOUS or namespaces exposed with QML_ELEMENT or QML_NAMED_ELEMENT(). For such types, QML_UNCREATABLE() can be used to provide a custom error message.
Some QObject functions, e.g. children(), return a QObjectList. QObjectList is a typedef for QList<QObject *>.
Some Qt classes and functions are thread-safe. These are mainly the thread-related classes (e.g. QMutex) and fundamental functions (e.g. QCoreApplication::postEvent()).
trans-unit.target: 一些Qt类和函数是线程安全的。这些主要是与线程相关的类（例如QMutex）和基本函数（例如QCoreApplication :: postEvent（））。

trans-unit.source: Some RPM versions have problems installing some of the Qt RPM archives where installation stops with an error message warning about a Failed Dependency. Use the --nodeps option of rpm as workaround this problem.
trans-unit.target: 某些RPM版本在安装某些Qt RPM归档文件时遇到问题，在这些文件中，安装将停止并显示一条错误消息，提示有关依赖项失败的信息。使用 rpm 的 --nodeps 选项作为解决此问题的方法。
